Thoughts on scaling agile

Dec 1, 2017 • Luis Mendoza

What makes an organization Agile?

Agile has been around for quite a while now. It’s not recent news that many organizations, from startups to big enterprises, have successfully scaled and improved the way they approach product development and software engineering by applying agile methodologies and practices in one way or another.

Most of the so called unicorns where born in agile. Other adopted some way of scaling their startup But some organizations are still in the early days of adopting agile methodologies and practices. There are numerous stories about big enterprises that have successfully transformed themselves into revitalized innovation-driven.
